tweets.text: Newcastle under Lyme are finding impossible to comply with covid regs due to an out of control landfill & inefficient regulation by the @EnvAgency We cant ventilate our homes due to the gas & cant sit outdoors with our families due to the fumes. Record numbers of complaints to EA https://t.co/X8ir7fH7JU
@poppers82 @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @WHO @NewsNBC ST7 means STINK value 7. Im in ST5 :) Thanks for the advice. Yes, I reported. It woke me up about 40 mins ago :(

@tayz_BETH @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @WHO @NewsNBC wind is going in the opposite direction to ST7 so f**k me that must be some powerful gas if it‚Äôs spreading like that I honestly just thought it would go in the direction of the wind . This is bad ü§¨ have you logged a complaint? I feel for you as it‚Äôs obviously cranked up üòï

Agree. Gaslighted by @PHE_EoEngland who told me to refer ‚Äòodour complaints‚Äô to the @EnvAgency . The odour is abhorrent but the health effects are becoming frightening. People are frightened @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice @Aaronbell and no one is listening https://t.co/Tnbf8TpD91

@lizzyabberley @SianieRoo @SolarplicityF @StinkStopthe @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Its toxic and carcinogenic,  some has World health Organisation guidelines like hydrogen sulphide now recorded broken and others where there is no safe level whatsoever, God knows what's been happening up to this point that's now a risk to health!

Just woken up by the STENCH in my bedroom. Air purifier on full, but my eyes hurt and my chest is wheezy. No COVIDRELIEF here ‚ò† WHERE ARE you those with authority to stop this ??? @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @WHO @NewsNBC Currently living in STink7 #XSTinktion

How are you protecting our vulnerable groups @PHE_EoEngland ? Your organisation claims to recognise pregnant ladies as vulnerable from a PH perspective, what will you do to protect this lady from the toxic fumes invading her home? @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/CO4ysd6d2C

@Colne_Valley @SpelthorneBC @EnvAgency The lake that feeds this bit of the river has dropped about 2 to 3 feet since this work has been done leaving the reed beds high and dry these beds were invaluable for birds and amphibians for nesting and breeding  what is planned to rectify this and return the lake levels
#stopthestink yet another weekend denied of fresh air. Breathing in putrid gas courtesy of @RedIndustries2

@gis_michelle @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 We haven't seen the ripping yet - but have been around campaigning long enough to know every network has politics. Is there an online forum? Haven't found it so far. If not, could, say, @theriverstrust or @AquiferChalk host one? Am I being naive? Sorry if putting foot in it.

@danih83_ @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @SoTCityCouncil @jogideon It‚Äôs pretty bad, and it seems to get everywhere. I only moved back to the area three weeks ago though and it hasn‚Äôt managed to dampen my happiness at being home again!

@HannahHiles @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL I feel for you, I lived in Halfway Place, I grew up there, my mum still lives there and I'm in Silverdale weekly so I know the stink well. I've even smelt it here in Stoke a few times now, I report to the EA when I do, and I've written to @SoTCityCouncil and @jogideon too.

tweets.text: @HannahHiles @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @SoTCityCouncil @jogideon I'm glad, I think it's important to try and focus on the positive things in our lives especially now during the pandemic too. It's awful to suffer it daily though and to think it's affecting the hospital, schools and care homes too is disgraceful and shouldn't be allowed.
